originalText.text:
I feel the same way about this doctor as the other reviewers. He has a great bedside manner and smart commentary about health. Staff are also excellent.

Please be kind to everyone here so they can happily continue to take care of us.

I hope he and his excellent team will manage their patient load such that there's enough care for us, and would pass on excess patients to other emerging primary care doctors with similar or better standards of care.

originalText.text: Always excellent!!!  My experience of many years with Dr. Friedman couldn’t be better — he is outstanding, professional in every possible way maintaining The Highest Standards.  In all my years with his practice, I don’t think I’ve Ever waited even 5 minutes!  He is extraordinary!  I had never before experienced an internist of his caliber; he never fails to be extremely thorough, attentive, and professional.  Anyone thinking about a new doctor would be extremely fortunate to be under Dr. Friedman’s care.

originalText.text:
Today was my first appointment with Dr. Friedman
Can I say I have always had a fear of doctors but oh my god he is a gift. Thank you GOD. He Is EVERYTHING you are looking for in a doctor.
